descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]Introduces a new craft in Skyrim.The Tailor's Shops can be finded at : [/font]

[b]Riften -[/b] [i]Take Curve to the right after you enter the city.House next door to Honeyside Manor + A little suprise for Mara followers[/i]
[b]Whiterun - [/b][i]Behind Breezehome[/i]
[b]Solitude Docks -[/b] [i]On a top of stairwell[/i]
[b]Falkreath - [/b][i]At north entrance house on a side of road[/i]
[b]Morthal-[/b] [i]take a curve before Falion's house[/i]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Tailors offer to sell most of the clothes,and most of the clothes you can craft at Tanning Rack.
Every tailor is specialised in selling certain type of clothes.
If you select to craft clothes you will need some material which are included in vanilla version,
and new materials which you can craft or buy.For Tailing you will need :[/font]
Bear,Fox,Wolf And Sabre Cat Pelts
Leather Strips
Leather
Netch Leather
[b]Cotton
[/b][b]Velvet
[/b][b]Flax
[/b][b]Cheap Buttons
[/b][b]Noble Buttons
Crimeneria Fabric
Ivorea Fabric
[/b][font=Comic Sans MS]The bolded ones are new and You can buy them at Bits & Pieces and also Riverwood Trader,
or you can make them At Tanning Rack.[/font][/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]There are many clothes to craft and some (not many thou) are explicitly female,
but you can craft them if your charachter is m and at least sell them.[/size][/font]

[size=3][color=#ffffff][size=3][u][b]Version 2.1
[/b][/u][font=Georgia][i]-[/i] Adds shoemaker's cart at Whiterun outskirts and shoemaker stand at Windhelm Market.
[/font][/size][/color][font=Georgia][color=#ffffff]There are also shoemaking tools where you can craft shoes.[/color][/font]

[u][b]Version 2.2
[/b][/u][font=Georgia][i]-[/i] Added 20 new cloth pcs from official DLC's.[/font]
[u][b][font=Arial]
Version 2.3 [/font]
[/b][/u] [font=Georgia]- Added Nightingale Armor,Thalmors,Psijic Orders and Thieves Guilds and also Vaermina's Priest.
- The shoeseller at Whiterun has new tent and entire Windhelm market has better look.[/font]

[b][u]Version 2.4 [/u]            
[font=Georgia]-[/font][/b][font=Georgia] Just a Little facelift.Added Shops Signs for tailor shops and corrected the detail in Riften conserning the ceiling.

[/font][font=Georgia][b][u]Version 2.5 [/u][/b]
[i]Added 13 new clothes,mostly females,but still craftable if your character is m,so that you can at least sell it.[/i]
- Wizard Robes Black
- Wizard Robes Red
- Wizard Robes Green
- Wolf Uniform
- Wolf Dress 
- Brigida Dress Blue
- Brigida Dress Red
- Red Finery
- Ball Gown Red
- Ball Gown Black Purple
- Ball Gown Green
[i]also [/i]Archmage's women variant [i]is replaced,as well as [/i]Radiant Raiment Fine Clothes [i]both f and m.[/i]
[i]If you sold them or lost them just type in console : [color=#000000]help radiant [/color]and then[color=#000000] player.additem  ##### 1[/color][/i]
-Also add 7 new shoe pairs - both male and female.

[b][u]Version 2.6 [/u][/b]
[i]Added 23 new clothes and replaced one variant of Blacksmith Appron with better one.[/i]
- Angel Dust and Devil's Tears suits thx to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55581/]BBDrac[/url]
- Tribunal Robes Red Variant thx to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20077/]Natterforme[/url]
- Casual Clothes I,II,III,IV
- Thane Regalia Var.1,Var.2
- Equisite Clothes I,II,III,IV,V,Vi,VIi
- Extravagant Dress
- Daedric Huntress Armor
- Three Variants Of Common Dress
- Kimono[/font]
[font=Georgia][i]The Casual Clothes III and Thane Regalia Var.2,female versions require special boots and gloves to acchieve complete look.

[/i][/font]
[b]Hope you Enjoy it  :)[/b]
[i]
P.S The structure in Riften is meant to be like an attachment to temple of Mara.There is also
Riften Sewers Office....i made those two since I had extra space after making an Tailor Shop.
If you do not like it,I can make version without them.


Credits :
Oaristys
Lor
Runs
Elianora
Zzjay
BBDrac
Natterforme
Strotti[/i]
[/size]
author: ibrica_orahovac
